title: T206 Piedmont 350 Burns-MC raw ow/high grade card

posts.post_title: T206 Piedmont 350 Burns-MC raw ow/high grade card
posts.post_content:
This card is clearly missing most of the name of Burns on bottom however has 
beautiful surfaces and relatively sharp all around as seen by photos
Would grade high otherwise, IMO
$100 F&F paypal takes it including shipping
